item.description: Django is a Python framework that simplifies web development by handling complex tasks for you.

item.title: Django Project MVT Structure
item.description: Django Project MVT Structure Django follows the MVT (Model-View-Template) architectural pattern, which is a variation of the traditional MVC (Model-View-Controller) design pattern used in web development.

item.title: CSS Properties
item.description: CSS Properties CSS properties are the foundation of web design, used to style and control the behaviour of HTML elements.

item.title: CSS Selectors
item.description: CSS Selectors CSS Selectors are used to target HTML elements on your pages, allowing you to apply styles based on their ID, class, attributes and more.
